page.title: 09Farming.
page.content: {Arable Farming} There have been a lot of changes in recent years of farming.Many sprays and chemicals have been introduced and more farmers are using them.The farms have become a lot larger and also more specialised.Ploughing by horse,though no longer used on farms,has become very popular for competition. Some crops grown in the area are wheat,barley,potatoes,carrots,lettuce, cauliflower,cabbage,onions and swedes. {Dairy Farming } Farmers are now using bulk containers instaid of kits.A recent change is the introduction of milk quotas by the E.E.C.,controlling the amount of milk produced.Clets have been developed to extract the milk from the cow,which makes it easier, faster and more economical for the farmer.One large dairy farm exists in our d-block.
